"エキスパートの条件を満たしていないため
クエストを受注できません。

※エキスパート条件は
\u3000クエストカウンターのマッチング設定から
\u3000「エキスパート対象のプレイヤーとのみ組む」で
\u3000必要な称号をご確認ください。"

"エキスパートの条件を満たしていないため

\u3000「エキスパート対象のプレイヤーとのみ組む」で

"Battle Arena quests can only be played in [Shared Ships]
Please move to a shared ship by:

・From the quest counter
Select [Play Battle Arena]

・From the block transfer teleporter
[Go To Shared Ship Battle Lobby]

・In the Quick Menu select [Go To Shared Ship]

[What is Shared Ship?]
You can undertake Battle Arena and Challenge Quest
together with players from other ships
through this dedicated Shared Ship."

"You will spend an [Extreme Pass]
by beginning this quest.

You can receive an [Extreme Pass] from
Administrator Pudding every 22 hours.

During some emergency trials,
recovery effects of items such as
Cosmo Atomizers will be decreased.
However, recovery effects of revival are not affected."

"Experience the compelling story
of the mysterious PSO2 universe.

Visit various places and discover
information that will open new paths
and reveal the truth.

Tackle these solo quests and
change your history!"

"ARKS quests are missions
with a specific goal.

By clearing that goal, you are
provided with a reward.

The goals and payments vary
by mission."

"Limited Quests are timed limited
quests that only appear during a
certain period of time.

Once it's gone, you cannot complete
Client Orders relating to it."

"Experience the compelling story
of the mysterious PSO2 universe.

Visit various places and discover
information that will open new paths
and reveal the truth.

Tackle these solo quests to
change the future and
create a different history!"

"For meetings and events,
this is limited to specific stores/net cafes.
This is a published quest?"

"Advance Quests need Advance Capsules
for each particular type of quest.

By clearing an Advance Quest,
your risk rises in that mission.

The mission's difficulty depends on the risk accumulated by the party leader.

Additionally, the risk resets each week."

"Free Fields allow for the exploration
of certain fields without restriction
on time or an objective.

Once you've reached the deepest
regions of the field, you will fight
a powerful enemy."

"Compete with other players
for the fastest times.

Quests are non-randomized
to ensure fairness.

Record your time attack
and check your rankings!"

"Time-limited Emergency Quests.

Includes missions such as repelling
enemies invading the city area.

Party play recommended
as many of these missions will have
a high level of difficulty."
"This quest type has no quests right now."

"Challenge Arena quests can only be
played in [Shared Ships] under a [Challenge Block].
Please enter it using the block transfer teleporter.

[What is Shared Ship?]
You can undertake Battle Arena and Challenge Quest
together with players from other ships
through this dedicated Shared Ship.
※Friends List, Mail, and Symbol Arts are
switched to the Shared Ship configuration.

[What is a challenge block?]
A block that allows you to begin a challenge
quest, that can be played on Shared Ships."

"「アークスGP2016予選」を公開中です。
今回のアークスGPクエストは、共通シップ
またはチャレンジブロックで受注できます。
ブロック転送テレポーターから移動して下さい。

「アークスGP2016予選」では
キャンプシップ内の「クラスセット端末」から
ハンタータイプ、レンジャータイプなど
各クラスの装備、クラススキルのセットを
選んでプレイすることができます。 "

"ネットカフェ限定のクエストを公開中です。
共通シップまたはチャレンジブロックでのみ
受注できます。
ブロック転送テレポーターから移動して下さい。

【共通シップ】
異なるシップに所属するプレイヤーと一緒に、
クエストをプレイできるシップです。
※フレンドリスト・メール・シンボルアートは
\u3000共通シップ専用のデータに切り替わります。

【チャレンジブロック】
対象クエストを受注できるブロックです。
受注できるクエストは共通シップと同じです。"

"Battle Arena quests can only be played in [Shared Ships]
Please move to a shared ship by:

・From the quest counter
Select [Play Battle Arena]

・From the block transfer teleporter
[Go To Shared Ship Battle Lobby]

・In the Quick Menu select [Go To Shared Ship]

[What is Shared Ship?]
You can undertake Battle Arena and Challenge Quest
together with players from other ships
through this dedicated Shared Ship."

"Buster Quests can be done after completing the [EPISODE 5] Story Quest \"Illogical World\".

※If other characters on your account have already unlocked Buster Quests by unlocking EPISODE 5, these quests will become available to all characters."

"Level, Equipment, Items etc are all reset
temporarily in this virtual space (VR)
training quest. Before the VR energy
disappears, aim to clear the most missions
possible.

Because all stats etc are reset, it is very
important to cooperate with your fellow
players and work together."

"Experience PHANTASY STAR ONLINE 2's
EPISODE 3 mystery and intrigue through
these quests.

If you freely explore these areas and
collect information, you may find new
ways to uncover the truth.

To uncover your destiny, you must
challenge these quests alone."

"Featured Quests are quests that are changed every day, and usually have boosts or are part of a campaign.

You can play the Featured Quest regardless of whether you have it unlocked or not."

"Investigate an abnormal corruption in the designated area.

You can complete the quest by earning points from defeating enemies.

Because of the very high degree of difficulty, you must meet certain conditions."

"A limited-time ARKS GP Quest
which can be accepted from a
challenge block.
Cannot be accepted after a set date.
You can earn Challenge Miles
by clearing this quest.

[Notice]
Please check the Players Site
for ARKS GP entry methods
and regulations."

"These quests give large amounts of
experience, rare drops, and meseta.
These quests can only be played solo.

At the beginning of the quest, a certain Bonus Key will be consumed.

Bonus Keys can be obtained by clearing
Recommended Quests with a rank of A
or higher, which gives a small chance to
receive one from the gift box at the end."

"Experience PHANTASY STAR ONLINE 2's
EPISODE 3 mystery and intrigue through
these quests."

"Welcome to ARKS Training Quests!

Here, you can practice the combat basics
of Phantasy Star Online 2.

First, let's do Common Training!

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Hunter\" class in battle.

\"Hunter\" is a class that specializes in
close-range combat using striking
weapons like Swords and Partizans.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Ranger\" class in battle.

\"Ranger\" is a class that specializes in
long-range combat using shooting
weapons like Assault Rifles.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Force\" class in battle.

\"Force\" is a class that specializes in
long-range combat using magical
\"Techniques\".

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Fighter\" class in battle.

\"Fighter\" is a class that specializes in
close-range combat using striking
weapons like Knuckles and Twin Daggers.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Gunner\" class in battle.

\"Gunner\" is a class that specializes in
near-mid-range combat using shooting
weapons like Twin Machineguns.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Techer\" class in battle.

\"Techer\" is a class that can fight directly
with Wands, use Technique attacks and
even provide support effects.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Braver\" class in battle.

\"Braver\" is a class that can fight both at
close-range using Katanas and at long-
range using Bullet Bows.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Bouncer\" class in battle.

\"Bouncer\" is a class that specializes in
tricky attacks using Dual Blades, Jet
Boots and even Techniques.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Summoner\" class in battle.

\"Summoner\" is a class that focuses on
training Pets and using Takts to have
them fight for you.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"You can use this to start a quest that
cannot be started normally, such as an
Emergency Quest that is not occurring.

When you initiate a quest in this way, a
\"Trigger Item\" appropriate to the quest
will be consumed.

If the player who consumed the Trigger
Item abandons the quest, all other players
in the room will also abandon it."

"These are quests aimed at acquiring the
highest score within the time limit.

These quests change daily along with
their field, objectives, enemies, and
more.

The high score is totaled according to the
quest difficulty level."

"大会やイベント用に特定店舗限定で
公開されているアークスＧＰクエストです。
クエストクリアするとチャレンジマイルを
獲得できます。"

"These are quests to hone your skills
against other ARKS in the Battle Arena.

Level, status, equipment, items, etc
will be set exclusively for Battle Arena.

You can earn Battle Coins by winning
matches, and trade them for various
items. If you keep winning, your Battle
Ranking will rise, earning you more coins.
"

"PHANTASY STAR ONLINE2 の世界の
謎に迫る物語のエピソード5を
体験するクエストです。"

"PHANTASY STAR ONLINE2 の世界の
謎に迫る過去の物語のエピソードを
総集編で体験するクエストです。"

"These are quests aimed at defeating the
opponent's forces within a set time limit.

Buster Points are saved automatically
and will update after each quest.
You can only do a certain amount of Main
Matches before needing to regenerate
them by doing Free Matches.

By winning a Free Match, you can earn
stamina towards doing Main Matches."

"Use this combat scenario to practice
using the \"Hero\" class in battle.

\"Hero\" is an advanced class that can deal
with any situation by using striking,
shooting and teching weapons.

※In Training Quests, your character's
stats and equipment will be set.
Additionally, you cannot access storage.

※You may return to a different block."

"A quest that can be picked up
for a specific campaign, or
ARKS Boost Rally, etc.

You can complete a target quest
that has a qualifying campaign
attached by doing a quest listed
from this option.

※During ARKS Boost Rally, only
ABR campaign quests will be listed here."

"「ダークブラスト」の戦闘操作や技術を
実戦形式で練習できます。

「ダークブラスト」は
ダークファルスの強力な力を駆使して
戦うことができる能力です。

※練習クエストでは、あなたのキャラクターの
\u3000強さや装備が専用の設定になります。
\u3000また、倉庫も利用できません。

※終了後、別のブロックに戻ることがあります。"

"制限時間内により多くのスコアを
獲得することを目的とした
仮想空間（ＶＲ）での訓練クエストです。
難度に応じてミッションの内容が変化し
受注のたびに、ミッションの繋がりも変化。
そのため、臨機応変な対応が求められます。

また、ハイスコアは
クエスト・難度・条件別で集計されます。"
"Chance to receive a present upon completion"

"特定のパートナーキャラクターを
同行させるクライアントオーダーを
受注しています。
このクライアントオーダーを行う場合は
新規ルームの作成をおすすめします。

新規ルームの作成を行いますか？

※「いいえ」を選択すると、新規ルームの
\u3000作成を行わずにクエストを受注します。

※参加歓迎が選択されています。
参加者が現れた場合、
パートナーキャラクターが帰還する可能性があります。
帰還させたくない場合は参加歓迎を選択せずに
クエストを再受注してください。"

"受注中のクエストは
「破棄ペナルティー」対象です！

破棄すると他のプレイヤーに迷惑がかかるため、
発生中の緊急クエストを再受注できなくなります。
また、強制的に別ブロックへの移動が行われます。

他のクエストを受注する場合は、クエスト破棄となり、
別ブロックに移動後、そのクエストを受注できます。

「破棄ペナルティー」を受け、クエストを破棄します。
よろしいですか？"
